speaker.whotheyare: Khalil Ramadi builds medical technologies that leverage the connection between the brain and the gut.
speaker.whylisten: TED Fellow Khalil Ramadi is a biomedical researcher developing hair-thin brain probes, ingestible medical devices and other innovative technologies. His work centers on creating minimally-invasive techniques to modulate neural physiology and studying how to build a nurturing entrepreneurial ecosystem to support translational technologies.
